name: DESTINY (itch) (Go reddy)
description:
"KEYS: USE- W-->UP and FRONT move "+

"USE-A-->LEFT,USE--S-->DOWN and BACK, USE--D--RIGHT move "+

"USE -E-->BOMB(BALL) TO HIT THE BELL , THIS WILL OPEN GATES.."+

"SPACE button for JUMP and use MOUSE for screen view "+

" TARGET-1: FINDING THE GOLD,DIOMOND,SILVER,PLATINUM MINES "+

"TARGET-2:COLLECTING THE COINS LOCATED IN BLUE FLAMES "+

" ON THE WAY YOU WILL BE SEEING ROTATING OBJECTS LIKE KNIFES, MINES "+

" WHICH MAY DECREASE YOUR HEALTH BY BY 10% "+

" IMPORTANT, EVERY 10 SECONDS ONE OBJECT WILL BE HITTED AT YOUR PLACE, "+

"* BY THIS YOU WILL LOOSE HEALTH BY DECREASING BY 1%, SO YOU NEED TO CHANGE YOUR LOACTION. "+

" IMPORTANT, UNDER WATER YOU MAY FIND SOME ROADS TO DESTINY "+

" IF YOUR IN WATER YOU MAY HAVE TO COME BACK TO NORMAL LEVEL TO SURVIVE, OTHERWISE YOUR HEALTH MAY LOOSE "+

"ALL THE BEST, TO START Press CLICK LEFT MOUSE BUTTON"
